name: nutify
tagline: A lightweight alert and notification tool for local networks
description: Nutify is a lightweight alert and activity push notification tool for local networks. It supports HTTP-based triggers and offers a minimal web-based UI for confirming, snoozing, or tracking alerts.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Trigger notifications by sending HTTP requests to the server

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: View, manage, and respond to alerts through a browser-based UI

features.title: Local Network Focus
features.description: Designed for internal networks without external dependencies

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage suitable for edge devices or small servers
